'''Solo: A Star Wars Story Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|solo-star-wars-story-skin-pack|SOLO: A Star Wars Story Skin Pack|August 28, 2018}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that includes 37 skins of characters from the space western film ''{{W|Solo: A Star Wars Story}}''.

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Whether you’re a driver, a flyer, or a smuggler, you’ve been waiting for a shot like this. Buckle up and jump into hyperspace with the Solo: A Star Wars Story(TM) Skin Pack! Assemble a crew with characters like Han Solo, Lando Calrissian, L3-37 and more!|Minecraft Marketplace description}}
